name: "Tricky Bulle Fruit"
desc: A former member of the Fruity Order and Blache's adoptive brother.

desc.text:
Crafty Bulle Fruit, my brother, you're always in my thoughts.
I can't believe the higher-ups sent Calla Lily to hunt you down just for the formula to that stupid potion. I guess you're Plum out of luck now, huh?
But don't worry, I made a big ruckus in the Order of the Fruit in your defense. They may have kicked me out over it, but I've got no regrets. I only hope your soul can rest in peace.
No one else knows this, but I've also put lots of Bulle Fruits in my new home to remember you by.
Looks like only four of the Five Great Operatives of the Order of the Fruit now remain.

imgDesc.text: Liffey Region: Fortress of Meropide - Fontaine

customize.text: Tricky Bulle Fruit's adoptive sister, whom he found when she was little. He hopes that Blanche will have a better future than he did and won't become a Treasure Hoarder.

customize.name: "Intrepid Valberry"
customize.desc: A former member of the Fruity Order and the Elegant Tableware Confrerie.

customize.text:
"Trendy Zaytun Peach"
"Guileless Wolfhook"
"Ruthless Calla Lily"
Members of the Fruity Order

customize.name: Formula: "Pure Water"
customize.desc: A detailed step-by-step formula for making "Pure Water."

customize.name: "Pure Water"
customize.desc: It is said to be the legacy of a genius potioneer. It can draw out the purest strength from within one's body.

customize.name: "Key"
customize.desc: Said to be the key to the World of Intense Purity. In reality, it is a fluid, and thus can easily change shape to fit into any keyhole.

customize.name: Empty Bottle
customize.desc: The meaning of an empty bottle is one full of air, which means other things can also be stored in it.

customize.name: Pure Pinecone
customize.desc: Much larger than an ordinary Pinecone. It must be because it is purer than an ordinary Pinecone.
